description.p: Gets the current TabbedUI pane index.

discussion.p: The *[js:tbiObj.getCurrentPaneIndex()]* method gets the index for the current pane Tabbed UI pane. Panes in a tabbed ui are zero-based index. This means the first pane has an index of 0, the second and index of 1, and so on.

p.example: var currentIndex = tbiObj.getCurrentPaneIndex(); alert("The current pane index is " + currentIndex);
